title: "Ottawa battles the pink robots by banning automated delivery vehicles"
excerpt: "The City of Ottawa is battling the pink robots. The transportation committee told city staff on Wednesday to give the boot to the mini automated delivery vehicles, which have been seen roaming sidewalks in the central area."
